ygData.subject: Re: A touch offtopic
ygData.msgSnippet: ... As a person who developed his cooking skill to master level on the Innoruuk server, I d have to safely say no. No food, no matter what I made, from edible
ygData.messageBody:
> items for: 'Does some food items last longer than others?'

As a person who developed his cooking skill to master level on the
Innoruuk server, I'd have to safely say no.

No food, no matter what I made, from edible goo to beer braised lion
steaks to troll cookies to vegetable soup ever lasted any longer or helped
heal any faster.

Basically, food is just for fun right now. My friends always enjoyed it
though, when they were out of food and I handed them a few beer braised
steaks.

Not too long ago someone posted an article on EQVault explaining how
food/water consumption works in detail. It had nothing to do with the type
of food.

Hopefully in the future Verant will make different types of food be worth
something.

In the meantime, if you want to save money, stick to muffins and milk.

---
Jesse <j@...>
http://www.lumiere.net/
